Name: Spinner Breaker
About the game: You need to protect the core from the ball by changing the side of the platform rotation around the core. You should also direct the ball towards the tiles, as it destroys them by gaining points. The tiles will appear over and over again, and the gameplay will speed up and you should try not to lose.
